venue.name: David Rockefeller Center for Latin Studies

item.description:
www.drclas.harvard.edu/drclas/events_open+house


Date: Wednesday, September 24, 2008
Time: 6:00 - 8:00 pm
Location: CGIS South, 2nd floor, 1730 Cambridge Street, Cambridge
Contact: David Rockefeller Center, drevents@fas.harvard.edu


The David Rockefeller Center for Latin American Studies cordially invites you to its Open House Celebration.

Featuring the Latin American and Latino Art Forum exhibit
Hunting and Gathering
Gallery talk by the artist Kyle Huffman, at 6:30 pm

Reception with refreshments and music.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: DRCLAS Open House Celebration / Gallery Talk / Music
